events.message: We have received John's application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
John's application has been categorised under Engineering as a software developer candidate.
Recruiter Sarah has been assigned to John's case and will reach out soon to coordinate next steps.
Initial screening call completed with John; he demonstrated strong knowledge of software development principles.
John responded promptly to our interview scheduling request, confirming availability for the technical interview.
Technical interview with John has been scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM to assess coding skills and problem-solving.
John completed the technical interview successfully, showing excellent proficiency in algorithms and coding.
An HR interview has been scheduled with John for May 18th to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
HR interview with John concluded positively; he expressed strong interest in our company values and culture.
An official job offer has been proposed to John, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
John provided positive feedback about the offer and asked for a few days to consider the details.
John accepted the job offer enthusiastically and is excited to join the software engineering team.
John's onboarding process has started smoothly with introductions to team members and setup of necessary tools.
The hiring process for John is now officially closed; he has successfully joined the engineering department.
